channel.title: [object][group]
channel.description: A frivolous cartoonist in East Anglia

item.title: Notes for September 2025
item.description: the adventures of stilton character sheets
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
item.category: after drawing some characters it isn't obvious what they are going feel like to draw over and over so character sheets where you can try the character out from different angles and are perfect to familiarise yourself but there is jeopardy as you can fall in or out of love with drawing a character

item.title: Notes for August 2025
item.description: the adventures of stilton character design process
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
item.category: An introduction to a new comic called the Adventures of Stilton and the heart of the story and then a few of the ways to create new character outlines so the characters look different from each other

item.title: Notes for July 2025
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
item.category: Attending a comic conference and all the ways that is fun
